attributes.about company: Konduto is a fraud detection service that helps e-commerce merchants spot fraud with Buying Behavior. We use browsing patterns to recognize fraudulent behavior on your website, so we can detect fraud even before the user submits the order.  Our algorithm relies on Machine Learning to quick identify new fraud patterns and adapt our scoring mechanism, so merchants don't need to constantly change their fraud settings.  When a merchant sends an order we analyze the customer‚Äôs browsing behavior and employ technologies such as Device Fingerprinting, IP Geolocation, Social Graph, Proxy Detection and Velocities. With a multi-language dashboard your fraud agents can work without struggling with a foreign language or technical terms they don't understand. attributes.about company: Leadcomm is a unique player in the Brazilian market, operating in the "One Stop Shop" format for Digital Security, offering a complete and leading range of solutions, products, services and highly specialized professionals, helping companies to fulfill the noble mission of digital security to protect against cyber attacks and data leakage, supporting and leveraging business areas for a secure digital transformation. These solutions encompass the security and privacy of structured and unstructured data, the security of mobile and web applications, the security of APIs, the security of endpoints, the increase in cyber defense capabilities, through intelligence, detection, orchestration and response against cyber attacks, the automation of offensive security processes and cyber security posture and the implementation of a leading Zero Trust Security architecture.
